The following permissions will be supplied for the current infobase on enabling security profile usage in 1C:Enterprise server cluster:

Changes in cluster required header page
Changes in cluster required header page
Предупреждение требуется внести изменения в кластере

В кластере серверов 1С:Предприятия для данной информационной базы настроены профили безопасности, ограничивающие доступ к внешним ресурсам.
Для продолжения выполняемого действия требуется внести изменения в состав разрешений в профиле безопасности:

The security profiles limiting the access to external resources are set up for this infobase in the cluster of 1C:Enterprise servers.
Make changes to the permissions in the security profile to continue:

The security profiles limiting the access to external resources are set up for this infobase in the cluster of 1C:Enterprise servers.
Make changes to the permissions in the security profile to continue:

The security profiles limiting the access to external resources are set up for this infobase in the cluster of 1C:Enterprise servers.

The security profiles limiting the access to external resources are set up for this infobase in the cluster of 1C:Enterprise servers.
Make changes to the permissions in the security profile to continue:

Предупреждение требуется внести изменения в кластере

В кластере серверов 1С:Предприятия для данной информационной базы настроены профили безопасности, ограничивающие доступ к внешним ресурсам. Требуется актуализировать настройки разрешений в профилях безопасности в кластере серверов, т.к. при использовании программы были изменены некоторые ее настройки (влияющие на использование программой внешних ресурсов):

The security profiles limiting the access to external resources are set up for this infobase in the cluster of 1C:Enterprise servers. Update the settings of permissions in the security profiles in the server cluster as some of the application settings have been changed during its use (impacting the use of external resources by the application):

The security profiles limiting the access to external resources are set up for this infobase in the cluster of 1C:Enterprise servers. Update the settings of permissions in the security profiles in the server cluster as some of the application settings have been changed during its use (impacting the use of external resources by the application):

The security profiles limiting the access to external resources are set up for this infobase in the cluster of 1C:Enterprise servers. Update the settings of permissions in the security profiles in the server cluster as some of the application settings have been changed during its use (impacting the use of external resources by the application):

The security profiles limiting the access to external resources are set up for this infobase in the cluster of 1C:Enterprise servers. Update the settings of permissions in the security profiles in the server cluster as some of the application settings have been changed during its use (impacting the use of external resources by the application):

The security profiles limiting the access to external resources are set up for this infobase in the cluster of 1C:Enterprise servers. Update the settings of permissions in the security profiles in the server cluster as some of the application settings have been changed during its use (impacting the use of external resources by the application):

The security profiles limiting the access to external resources are set up for this infobase in the cluster of 1C:Enterprise servers. Update the settings of permissions in the security profiles in the server cluster as some of the application settings have been changed during its use (impacting the use of external resources by the application):
Не удалось настроить разрешения в профиле безопасности:
Cannot set up permissions in the security profile:
Cannot set up permissions in the security profile:
Cannot set up permissions in the security profile:
Cannot set up permissions in the security profile:
Cannot set up permissions in the security profile:
Cannot set up permissions in the security profile:
При ошибке версии компоненты "comcntr", требуется выполнить ее регистрацию (потребуется перезапуск сеанса).
In case of the version error of the "comcntr" component, it must be registered (session restart required).
In case of the version error of the "comcntr" component, it must be registered (session restart required).
In case of the version error of the "comcntr" component, it must be registered (session restart required).
In case of the version error of the "comcntr" component, it must be registered (session restart required).
In case of the version error of the "comcntr" component, it must be registered (session restart required).
In case of the version error of the "comcntr" component, it must be registered (session restart required).
Для настройки разрешений в профиле безопасности укажите параметры подключения к кластеру серверов, в котором развернута информационная база:
To set up permissions in the security profile, specify the connection settings for the server cluster where the infobase is deployed:
To set up permissions in the security profile, specify the connection settings for the server cluster where the infobase is deployed:
To set up permissions in the security profile, specify the connection settings for the server cluster where the infobase is deployed:

To set up permissions in the security profile, specify the connection settings for the server cluster where the infobase is deployed:
To set up permissions in the security profile, specify the connection settings for the server cluster where the infobase is deployed:

Декорация предупреждение о необходимости перезапуска картинка
После внесения изменений в настройки профилей безопасности в кластере серверов программа будет автоматически перезапущена.
Once the security profile settings in the server cluster are changed, the application is restarted automatically.
Once the security profile settings in the server cluster are changed, the application is restarted automatically.
Once the security profile settings in the server cluster are changed, the application is restarted automatically.
Once the security profile settings in the server cluster are changed, the application is restarted automatically.
Once the security profile settings in the server cluster are changed, the application is restarted automatically.
Once the security profile settings in the server cluster are changed, the application is restarted automatically.

В кластере серверов 1С:Предприятия для данной информационной базы настроены профили безопасности, ограничивающие доступ к внешним ресурсам.
Для продолжения выполняемого действия требуется внести следующие изменения в настройки профилей безопасности в кластере серверов:

The security profiles limiting the access to external resources are set up for this infobase in the cluster of 1C:Enterprise servers.
To continue, make the following changes to the settings of security profiles in the server cluster:

Внесение изменений в настройки профилей безопасности в кластере серверов не может быть выполнено при подключении к программе с использованием веб-клиента.
Для выполнения запрошенной операции требуется подключиться к программе с использованием тонкого клиента и повторить выполняемую операцию.

You can not change the settings of security profiles in the server cluster when you access the application via web client.
To execute the requested operation connect to the application via thin client and repeat the operation.
